content.question: Isolated Blackbody <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> has surface area <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math>, is at temperature <math alttext="T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>T</mi></math>, and emits radiation with power <math alttext="P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>. Isolated Blackbody <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> has surface area <math alttext="the fraction A over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>, is at temperature <math alttext="2 T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>T</mi></math>, and emits radiation with power <math alttext="P sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="P sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math> to <math alttext="P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math> and provides a valid justification?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub Y equals P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, because the product of the surface area and temperature is the same for both blackbodies.

<math alttext="P sub Y equals P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, because both blackbodies are isolated.

<math alttext="P sub Y is greater than P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, because the power dissipated from a blackbody is inversely proportional to the surface area of the blackbody.

<math alttext="P sub Y is greater than P sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, because the power dissipated from a blackbody is proportional to the temperature to the fourth power of the blackbody.
